# Call `plotly`

```{r}
#| output: false

library(plotly)

```

# Set Geographic Parameters

```{r}

g <- list(
  projection = list(type = 'robinson'), # robinson projection
  # projection = list(type = 'orthographic', # globe projection
  #                   rotation = list(lon = 0,
  #                                   lat = 0,
  #                                   roll = 0)),
  showcountries = TRUE, # show countries
  showland = TRUE, # show land
  landcolor = toRGB("forestgreen"), # land color
  showocean = TRUE, # show ocean
  oceancolor = "lightblue") # ocean color

```

# Map Without Geographic Parameters

```{r}

plot_geo() 

```

# Map With Geographic Paramters

```{r}

plot_geo() %>% 
  layout(geo = g)

```
